mapper.select: select CANDIDATE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, NAME, WEIGHT, ITEM_SIZE, TB_URL, TB_PRICE, TB_REMARK, EB_URL, EB_PRICE, EB_SOLD_QUALITY, EB_REMARK, TB_SHIPPING_FEE, REMARK, STATUS, CURRENCY_ID, TB_FULL_NAME, EB_FULL_NAME, EB_SHIPPING_FEE, ALI_URL, ALI_PRICE, ALI_REMARK, EB_SITE, ITEM_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, IS_SELLING, SELLING_PER_DAY, SELLING_DAYS, COST, PROFIT, PROFIT_RATE, EB_IMAGE_URL, TRANSPORT_MODE,IMAGE_URL,TRANSPORT_FEE,SKU from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM where CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select CANDIDATE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, NAME, WEIGHT, ITEM_SIZE, TB_URL, TB_PRICE, TB_REMARK, EB_URL, EB_PRICE, EB_SOLD_QUALITY, EB_REMARK, TB_SHIPPING_FEE, REMARK, STATUS, CURRENCY_ID, TB_FULL_NAME, EB_FULL_NAME, EB_SHIPPING_FEE, ALI_URL, ALI_PRICE, ALI_REMARK, EB_SITE, ITEM_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, IS_SELLING, SELLING_PER_DAY, SELLING_DAYS, COST, PROFIT, PROFIT_RATE, EB_IMAGE_URL, TRANSPORT_MODE,IMAGE_URL,TRANSPORT_FEE,SKU from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM where CANDIDATE_ID in (select distinct CANDIDATE_ID from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF WHERE ITEM_ID=#{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select CANDIDATE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, NAME, WEIGHT, ITEM_SIZE, TB_URL, TB_PRICE, TB_REMARK, EB_URL, EB_PRICE, EB_SOLD_QUALITY, EB_REMARK, TB_SHIPPING_FEE, REMARK, STATUS, CURRENCY_ID, TB_FULL_NAME, EB_FULL_NAME, EB_SHIPPING_FEE, ALI_URL, ALI_PRICE, ALI_REMARK, EB_SITE, ITEM_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, IS_SELLING, SELLING_PER_DAY, SELLING_DAYS, COST, PROFIT, PROFIT_RATE, EB_IMAGE_URL, TRANSPORT_MODE,IMAGE_URL,TRANSPORT_FEE,SKU from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM
mapper.insert: insert into EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM (CANDIDATE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, NAME, WEIGHT, ITEM_SIZE, TB_URL, TB_PRICE, TB_REMARK, EB_URL, EB_PRICE, EB_SOLD_QUALITY, EB_REMARK, TB_SHIPPING_FEE, REMARK, STATUS, CURRENCY_ID, TB_FULL_NAME, EB_FULL_NAME, EB_SHIPPING_FEE, ALI_URL, ALI_PRICE, ALI_REMARK, EB_SITE, ITEM_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, IS_SELLING, SELLING_PER_DAY, SELLING_DAYS, COST, PROFIT, PROFIT_RATE, EB_IMAGE_URL, TRANSPORT_MODE,IMAGE_URL,TRANSPORT_FEE,SKU) values (#{candidateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #weight:DECIMAL#, #{itemSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #tbPrice:DECIMAL#, #{tbRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #ebPrice:DECIMAL#, #ebSoldQuality:DECIMAL#, #{ebRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #tbShippingFee:DECIMAL#, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #ebShippingFee:DECIMAL#, #{aliUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #aliPrice:DECIMAL#, #{aliRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isSelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #sellingPerDay:DECIMAL#, #sellingDays:DECIMAL#, #cost:DECIMAL#, #profit:DECIMAL#, #profitRate:DECIMAL#, #{ebImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#transportFee:DECIMAL#,#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM set CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #weight:DECIMAL#, ITEM_SIZE = #{itemSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_URL = #{tbUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_PRICE = #tbPrice:DECIMAL#, TB_REMARK = #{tbRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_URL = #{ebUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_PRICE = #ebPrice:DECIMAL#, EB_SOLD_QUALITY = #ebSoldQuality:DECIMAL#, EB_REMARK = #{ebRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_SHIPPING_FEE = #tbShippingFee:DECIMAL#, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY_ID = #{currencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_FULL_NAME = #{tbFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_FULL_NAME = #{ebFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_SHIPPING_FEE = #ebShippingFee:DECIMAL#, ALI_URL = #{aliUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALI_PRICE = #aliPrice:DECIMAL#, ALI_REMARK = #{aliRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_SITE = #{ebSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_SELLING = #{isSelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLING_PER_DAY = #sellingPerDay:DECIMAL#, SELLING_DAYS = #sellingDays:DECIMAL#, COST = #cost:DECIMAL#, PROFIT = #profit:DECIMAL#, PROFIT_RATE = #profitRate:DECIMAL#, EB_IMAGE_URL = #{ebImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT_MODE = #{transportMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_URL = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT_FEE=#transportFee:DECIMAL#, SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM set CANDIDATE_ID = #{record.candidateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_ID = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #record.weight:DECIMAL#, ITEM_SIZE = #{record.itemSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_URL = #{record.tbUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_PRICE = #record.tbPrice:DECIMAL#, TB_REMARK = #{record.tbRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_URL = #{record.ebUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_PRICE = #record.ebPrice:DECIMAL#, EB_SOLD_QUALITY = #record.ebSoldQuality:DECIMAL#, EB_REMARK = #{record.ebRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_SHIPPING_FEE = #record.tbShippingFee:DECIMAL#, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY_ID = #{record.currencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_FULL_NAME = #{record.tbFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_FULL_NAME = #{record.ebFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_SHIPPING_FEE = #record.ebShippingFee:DECIMAL#, ALI_URL = #{record.aliUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALI_PRICE = #record.aliPrice:DECIMAL#, ALI_REMARK = #{record.aliRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EB_SITE = #{record.ebSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{record.itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_SELLING = #{record.isSelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLING_PER_DAY = #record.sellingPerDay:DECIMAL#, SELLING_DAYS = #record.sellingDays:DECIMAL#, COST = #record.cost:DECIMAL#, PROFIT = #record.profit:DECIMAL#, PROFIT_RATE = #record.profitRate:DECIMAL#, EB_IMAGE_URL = #{record.ebImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT_MODE = #{record.transportMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_URL = #{record.imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT_FEE = #record.transportFee:DECIMAL#, SKU = #{record.sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM c where c.item_id in (select i.item_id from eb_item i where i.seller_id=#{VARCHAR})
